app.name: TaskWing.app
app.description: AI-powered task manager for developers. Automates project planning, task breakdown, and prioritization via CLI-first UX.

feature.name: Task Creation & Management
feature.details: Create, view, update, delete tasks. Each task: title, description, status, priority, dependencies, due date, tags, assignee.

feature.name: AI-Assisted Task Generation
feature.details: Input natural language (spec, PRD, user prompt); AI generates structured tasks/subtasks; suggests priorities.

feature.name: AI-Driven Task Breakdown
feature.details: Expand complex tasks into granular, actionable steps with dependencies.

feature.name: Intelligent Prioritization
feature.details: AI suggests task priority, grouping, ordering—aligned with project goals.

feature.name: Dependency Management
feature.details: Users define dependencies between tasks. System enforces/visualizes dependencies.

feature.name: Model Agnosticism
feature.details: Support multiple LLMs (OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, etc.) via user API keys.

feature.name: Storage & Persistence
feature.details: Reliable, local storage and retrieval of task/project data (e.g., FileTaskStore).

feature.name: User Interface (CLI First)
feature.details: Developer-centric CLI for all core operations. Future: editor/MCP integration.

feature.name: Project Initialization
feature.details: Command to set up a new TaskWing project (e.g., `taskwing init`).

feature.name: Task Listing & Filtering
feature.details: List tasks with robust filtering (status, priority, tags, due date, etc.) and sorting.

feature.name: Configuration Management
feature.details: Local config for API keys and preferences. API keys never leave the user's machine.

constraints.constraint: AI prompting, model selection, and UI/UX implementation are not covered here—define separately.
All features must operate locally; no unapproved remote calls.
